text: Sipsey Creek is a stream in the U.S. states of Alabama and Mississippi. It is a tributary to the Buttahatchee River. Sipsey is a name derived from the Choctaw language meaning "poplar tree". Variant names are "Sipsey River", "Sipsie Fork", and "Sipsie River". ==References== Category:Rivers of Alabama Category:Bodies of water of Lamar County, Alabama Category:Bodies of water of Marion County, Alabama Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Monroe County, Mississippi
title: Sipsey Creek (Buttahatchee River tributary)
